docs.snippet: It might be way too early to call the Pittsburgh Pirates a team of destiny. But after what manager Clint Hurdle witnessed Thursday night, he had to stop and wonder....

docs.snippet: After years of feuding over drug-testing protocols, the N.F.L. and the players union have reached an agreement on a new plan for performance-enhancing drugs....
docs.lead_paragraph: After years of feuding over drug-testing protocols, the N.F.L. and the players union have reached an agreement on a new plan for performance-enhancing drugs.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; NFL and players' union announce that have reached agreement on new drug-testing protocol; most significant change is that players will be tested for human growth hormone for the first time; other football news noted.

headline.main: N.F.L. and Union Agree on Drug Plan
headline.print_headline: League and Players Union Agree on Drug Plan
